alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Albany, northwestern Platte and south central Converse Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laprele Reservoir, or 10 miles southwest of Douglas, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Esterbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; North Laramie Range
